Posts.Content: babysister I have been called back quite a few times, after a mastectomy in1997 they found calcification in my remaining breast, they were just making sure nothing nasty was happening in 2007 they decided all was fine and discharged me. Good luck I hoe everything turns out well, keep us posted.
Posts.Title: microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Hello tigger 67 the other x-ray will probably be another mammogram just to double check and an ultra sound gives them more information they may do a fine needle biopsy, hopefully you will get the all clear most lumps are harmless but its better to check them out. I noticed from your profile you have posted on the thyroid forum, I am very new here and I will be looking in there very soon as I suffer from an under active thyroid.
Posts.Title: First mammogram came back abnormal

Posts.Content: I think you should be guided by your mother oncologist he is the expert, when I was first told I had breast cancer I insisted I was going on holiday before any treatment luckily I have a daughter who is a radiographer and she helped me to see sense, after my mastectomy I had radiotherapy 4 months later this was 1997 and I am still here, I wouldn t delay treatment.
Posts.Title: Delaying radiation?

Posts.Content: I also have the small dot tattoos I knew they would be permanent they dont bother me at all, not many people see them anyway
Posts.Title: Anyone Else Get "Tattooed" from Core Biopsy?

Posts.Content: nycjane I think the reason no one has answered is we lay men don't understand, but as abreast cancer survivor who has had many investigations I would be asking why you haven't had a biopsy taken that would show and cancerous cells. good luck hope its all clear.
Posts.Title: question re mammogram callback

Posts.Content: Go as soon as possible it hopefully a harmless cyst, but if it is anything nasty the sooner treated the better. I am a breast cancer survivor of 11 years and thank god for the surgeon who decided lets take this lump which refuses to go down out, the middle was cancer.
Posts.Title: how long should I wait to see a doctor for a lump in my armpit?
